apple_vendor_description: Apple’s rendition of the kiss person (man) emoji with a medium-dark skin tone is a close-up portrayal of affection, as seen on Apple devices. The emoji features a man’s face with soft, rounded edges and a gentle expression, conveying warmth and tenderness.  The characteristic glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients on Apple’s design language give the face a polished, approachable look, making this emoji ideal for expressing romantic sentiments, affection, or a simple, loving gesture in digital exchanges.
